name: Virtual Blowjob
description:

1. There are three actions she can perform. When you click on one of the faces on the right of the screen she will perform this oral action.
2. On the left of the screen is the result of the sexual action she is performing. When the gauge has reached the score of 520 you have reached climax.
3. At the top of the game is a small colored circle. When the hot babe appreciates your cock, the color is pink, if she is really loving your cock, it changes to red and your score on the left increases even faster.  When that light turns blue, she is bored and down goes your score. Make sure she loves your cock!
Go give it a try.
